name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - H  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a spider?
questions.explanation:
Hairy.

	Hairy is a wolf spider.  He has brown legs and a brown face, but his abdomen, which is the large part of his body, is gray and hairy. "Hairy the spider hangs from a threadLooking at you from overheadHanging around is his favorite wayOf spending each and every day!"

questions.text: Which of these is a pig?
questions.explanation:
Hamlet.

	Hamlet the pig is all pink, just like most pig Beanie Babies.  He is light pink with dark pink on the inside of his ears, on his snout, and on his hooves. "I'm not too neat, I must confessMy friends all think my home's a messBut I think it suits me just fine'Cause, after all, I am a swine!"

questions.text: Which of these is a cookie?
questions.explanation:
Hansel.

	Hansel is a gingerbread man.  He has a red nose, a red and white plaid bow tie, a red button, and a green button. "Together we can make a treat A dash of spice and dab of sweet With some icing that we can spread Look! It's a boy of gingerbread!"

questions.text: Which of these is a hippopotamus?
questions.explanation:
Happy.

	Happy the hippo comes in two colors.  The more common color is purple.  The much more rare color of this hippo is gray, and he can be worth quite a lot of money. "Happy the Hippo loves to wadeIn the river and in the shadeWhen Happy shoots water out of his snoutYou know he's happy without a doubt!"

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a color Hark the bear comes in?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	The white Hark bear is a white bear with a red nose and a green bow.  The red Hark bear is a red bear with a green nose and a white bow.  The green Hark bear is a green bear with a white nose and a red bow.  They all have wings, as these are angel bears.  They all have different poems. Hark the white bear: "It's time to grow and time to learn It's time to show caring concern Time to show we know the reason For now is the most joyful season!" Hark the red bear: "It's time to laugh and time to share It's time to show how much we care Time to show we know the reason For now is the most joyful season!" Hark the green bear: "It's time to love and time to give It's time to share the lives we live Time to show we know the reason For now is the most joyful season!"

questions.text: Which of these bears is an author and an editor?
questions.explanation:
Hawthorne.

	Hawthorne the bear loves to write books, and proofread, too.  He is a brown bear with very curly hair, and he wears a brown bow. "I'll write a story just for you But first there's one thing I must doI'll proofread it once or even twiceTo make sure everything's precise!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Herder.

	Herder the dog is a sheep dog.  He is white and gray, with very curly hair.  He wears a pinkish orange and purple bow. "My job each day is herding sheepThe days are long, there's little sleepBut when my day is finally throughI'm happy to come home to you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Hobo.

	Hobo the dog is another sheep dog, but he is black and white.  He wears a bandanna around his neck, his favorite thing.  The bandanna is red with a paisley design on it. "Around my neck or on my head Tied in a knot or bow instead My bandana is so cool you see It's my favorite accessory!"

questions.text: Which of these is a calico cat?
questions.explanation:
Hodges.

	Hodges the cat has a brownish orange and black splotchy pattern on her back.  She has a white stomach and legs. "If it's a special pet you seekI know a cat that's quite uniqueWith feline grace and such beautyWho is this cat ? Who else but me!"

questions.text: Which of these is a rooster?
questions.explanation:
Homeland.

	Homeland the rooster is designed like the American flag.  His head is white, with red around his eyes, a red waddle, and a red top of his head.  His legs are also red.  His main body is blue with white stars all over him, with red under the wings.  His tail is red and white striped. "I just cannot help but crow About this great land that I know Where everyone can all be free The U.S.A.'s the best to me!"
